short_description: A classic Japanese dish featuring tender chicken glazed in a sweet and savory teriyaki sauce.
An Italian favorite, this hearty pasta dish features a rich tomato-based sauce with ground beef and aromatic herbs.
A colorful and nutritious dish packed with a variety of fresh vegetables and tossed in a flavorful stir-fry sauce.
ingredients: 300 g mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots)

short_description: A classic salad featuring crisp romaine lettuce, garlic croutons, Parmesan cheese, and a creamy Caesar dressing.
A fragrant and spicy curry loaded with a medley of colorful vegetables and simmered in a coconut milk-based sauce.
ingredients: 400 g mixed vegetables (potatoes, carrots, peas, bell peppers)

short_description: Indulge your sweet tooth with this moist and decadent chocolate cake, perfect for any occasion.
